00036 /*
00037  * Move the file without checks.
00038  */
00039 static bool MoveWithoutChecks(const char *oldFile, const char *newFile)
00040 {
00041 #ifdef WIN32
00042         return (MoveFile(oldFile, newFile) == TRUE);
00043 #else
00044         return (rename(oldFile, newFile) == 0);
00045 #endif
00046 }
00047 
00048 static bool CopyWithoutChecks(const char *in, const char *out)
00049 {
00050     bool result = true;
00051 
00052     std::ifstream is (in,std::ios::binary);
00053     std::ofstream os (out,std::ios::binary);
00054     if(!is.good() || !os.good())
00055         result = false;
00056 
00057     os << is.rdbuf();
00058     if(!is.good() || !os.good())
00059         result = false;
00060 
00061     is.close();
00062     os.close();
00063     if(!is.good() || !os.good())
00064         result = false;
00065 
00066     return true;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /*
00070  * Check if the new file needs to be deleted first.
00071  * Then move the file.
00072  */
00073 bool ConverterMoveFile(const char *oldFile, const char *newFile, bool overwrite)
00074 {
00075         // No overwrite of the new file.
00076         if (overwrite == false)
00077         {
00078                 // Dont move if the file exists.
00079                 if (ConverterFileExists(newFile) == true)
00080                         return false;
00081 
00082                 // Move the file.
00083                 return MoveWithoutChecks(oldFile, newFile);
00084         }
00085 
00086         // Overwrite if exists.
00087         else
00088         {
00089                 // Remove the new file first.
00090                 if (ConverterRemoveFile(newFile) == false)
00091                         return false;
00092 
00093                 // Move the file.
00094                 return MoveWithoutChecks(oldFile, newFile);
00095         }
00096 }
00097 
00098 /*
00099  * Check if the new file needs to be deleted first.
00100  * Then copy the file.
00101  */
00102 bool ConverterCopyFile(const char *oldFile, const char *newFile, bool overwrite)
00103 {
00104         // No overwrite of the new file.
00105         if (overwrite == false)
00106         {
00107                 // Dont move if the file exists.
00108                 if (ConverterFileExists(newFile) == true)
00109                         return false;
00110 
00111                 // Move the file.
00112                 return CopyWithoutChecks(oldFile, newFile);
00113         }
00114 
00115         // Overwrite if exists.
00116         else
00117         {
00118                 // Remove the new file first.
00119                 if (ConverterRemoveFile(newFile) == false)
00120                         return false;
00121 
00122                 // Move the file.
00123                 return CopyWithoutChecks(oldFile, newFile);
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00127 /*
00128  * Check if exists, if so then remove it.
00129  */
00130 bool ConverterRemoveFile(const char *fileName)
00131 {
00132         if (ConverterFileExists(fileName) == true)
00133         {
00134 #ifdef WIN32
00135                 if (DeleteFile(fileName) == false)
00136                         return false;
00137 #else
00138                 if (remove(fileName) != 0)
00139                         return false;
00140 #endif
00141         }
00142         return true;
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*
00146  * Check if the file exists.
00147  */
00148 bool ConverterFileExists(const char *fileName)
00149 {
00150   return (affymetrix_calvin_utilities::FileUtils::Exists(fileName));
00151 }

00153 void ConverterCreateAndAddParentArrayGenericDataHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader& hdr, std::string arrayID, std::wstring arrayBarcode)
00154 {
00155         // Create a new parent GenericDataHeader and add to the current GenericDataHeader
00156         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader parentGDH;
00157         parentGDH.SetFileTypeId(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00158 
00159         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00160         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_ID_PARAM_NAME);
00161         nvt.SetValueAscii(arrayID.c_str());
00162         parentGDH.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00163 
00164         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_BARCODE_PARAM_NAME);
00165         nvt.SetValueText(arrayBarcode.c_str());
00166         parentGDH.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00167 
00168         hdr.AddParent(parentGDH);
00169 }
